channel.title: Mount & Blade
channel.description: I am pretty amazed no one posted this yet. [URL=http://www.taleworlds.com/]Mount & Blade HomePage[/url] This is a medieval game, non fantasy, so no potions or anything. It is made so you are not the hero [although you can be in the various and easily made mods] but instead you are just another person in the Medieval World. It is a very fun game, and I recommend you try it. The demo lets you play to level 6 [a good taste of combat] but you can get it after that free [if you know what i mean ;)]. It is also not combat based, but I find that the best part of the game, even if you just have arena fights. [url=http://www.taleworlds.com/download/mb_in_game_1_high.avi]Game Play Video[/url] [b]Screenshots[/b] [img]http://www.taleworlds.com/mb_ss/5.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.taleworlds.com/mb_ss/20.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.taleworlds.com/mb_ss/42.jpg[/img] Also, there are some fun glitches to find. For anyone thats played: Go to the Uxkhal arena, and you can jump into the spectator booth to your left.

It’s fun, but somewhat graphically powerful.

item.title: Mount & Blade
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

I am pretty amazed no one posted this yet.
Mount & Blade HomePage
This is a medieval game, non fantasy, so no potions or anything. It is made so you are not the hero [although you can be in the various and easily made mods] but instead you are just another person in the Medieval World. It is a very fun game, and I recommend you try it. The demo lets you play to level 6 [a good taste of combat] but you can get it after that free [if you know what i mean ;)].
It is also not combat based, but I find that the best part of the game, even if you just have arena fights.
Game Play Video
Screenshots



Also, there are some fun glitches to find. For anyone thats played: Go to the Uxkhal arena, and you can jump into the spectator booth to your left.
